## Mutable type

Make all properties in T mutable (remove readonly decorator) .

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type Mutable<T> = {
  -readonly [P in keyof T]: T[P]
}
```

## Example


```ts
   interface Props {
     readonly a: number;
     readonly b: number;
     readonly c: number;
   };
   // Expect: { a: number; b: number; c: number; }
   type NewProps = Mutable<Props>;
```
